<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Remediate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4696) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

</column>

---

If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces. In addition to its normal effects, you use your heal or harm spell to attempt to counteract one divine effect in the spell’s area.
